page.title: 09EASTHAM CHURCH
page.content: THE CHURCH IS IN THE UNITED BENEFICE OF TEME VALLEY SOUTH WITH ROCHFORD, KYRE,STOKE BLISS,HANLEY WILLIAM AND HANLEY CHILDE PARISHES. THE CHURCH HASN'T GOT A RECTOR AT THE MOMENT BUT THE REV BRYANT IS COMING IN JULY FOR 5 YEARS.THERE IS A SERVICE ONCE A MONTH. THERE ARE USUALLY ABOUT 13 PEOPLE IN THE CONGREGATION. AT EACH SERVICE THEY GET ABOUT Â£5 IN THE COLLECTION. IT COSTS ABOUT Â£1500 A YEAR TO RUN THE CHURCH SO PEOPLE HOLD COFFEE MORNINGS AND GARDEN FETES.THERE ARE ABOUT 6 CHRISTENINGS,4 WEDDINGS AND 4 FUNERALS A YEAR.THEY HAVE A CLEANER WHO COMES EVERY FRIDAY AND SHE GETS Â£40 A YEAR.THE ORGANIST IS MRS BIRCH AND SHE GETS Â£25 A YEAR. THE ORGAN IS A SMALL PIPE ORGAN.
